data.text: We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel! We have booked a suite (2 adults and 2 children). The room was very comfortable, it was great to have 2 showers and a bath for the little one. The swimming pool for children was a pleasure. It is 40 cm depth and has a wooden pergola, so children don’t get burn at the sun. The water is very warm there. We have stayed at the beach most of the time and really enjoyed the service there. Great thanks to Ashan, Silvey and Abhishek! They made our stay very comfortable and pleasant! Thank you, guys! We will definitely be back:)
data.title: Great time, great service!

data.text:
We booked this hotel following a recommendation from a friend and relative for the area itself. The hotel staff from day one were amazing, a warm cookie provided upon arrival went down well with the kids after a long journey ! We travelled as a family of 5 MIL, 14 year old, 12 year old myself and partner. We wanted to stay in a living space together with separate bedrooms. This hotel provided exactly that. We stayed in a 3 bedroom apartment with sea view. The rooms were very spacious, pressure in the showers was perfect, beds and pillows were incredibly comfortable. The connected living space, kitchen and  dining area was enormous with incredible views of the wheel, beach , sea and swimming pool. Standard tea and coffee making facilities replenished daily, bottled water also provided daily. 
We were spoilt for choice with breakfast, huge variety to choose from depending on what you want. Great facilities and seating both inside and outside. The hotel itself was  clean throughout.
Swimming pool and swim up bar    Service excellent , again staff were accommodating , friendly and always available. Swimming pool was warm and a hit for both adults and children on the cloudy days of our stay. 
Beach is clean and easy to get to from the hotel. 
We only had breakfast included  as part of our stay.  A variety of restaurants to suit individual budgets can be found within walking distance. 
We travelled out to see various sights using Uber from outside the hotel or inside the lobby straightforward and easy. 
If travelling on foot, plenty of areas to explore and beachfront walk was lovely every morning after breakfast. 
Wifi connection could be better in the apartment living space we seemed to have an intermittent connection there, however, signal strong in bedrooms and throughout hotel. 
Overall an excellent stay , impeccable service from the hotel staff, would certainly recommend for families.
data.title: Excellent family stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton JBR

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear HKH,

Greetings from Doubletree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach. I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback. We greatly appreciate any comments made by our valuable guests such as yourself and we always strive to achieve the highest level of service. We are truly heartened to know how much you enjoyed your stay in our hotel and that you appreciate the overall service and our hotel facilities. Our team takes pride in providing a genuine sense of hospitality, so it is wonderful to read that your experience with our team was positive. It has been a privilege to serve you and we very much look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Best Regards, 
Roufan Riaz 
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Roufan Riaz

data.text:
Booked to go for Brunch and the beach club as we were in Dubai for 2 days on our cruise. From the minute we booked to finishing the meal, the staff were amazing. 
The facilities are brilliant and as for the food, another level. Would highly recommend this and a big shout out for Amit, our waiter. Can’t wait to come back.
data.title: Brunch and Beach club

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Claires, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel and highlight the aspects you enjoyed about your dinning and beach access, particularly our facilities and staff especially Amit and serving team, additional to that I will personally share your comment with the mentioned team member. It has been a privilege to serve you and we very much look forward to welcoming you back again at Doubletree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach. 

Best Regards, 
Roufan Riaz 
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Roufan Riaz

data.text:
Celebrating our 50th Anniversary 
We were really looked after by all staff
Food fantastic amazing choice of food on offer and well presented
Large Rooms very well equipped and cleaned every day 
Lovely clean hotel within walking distance of beach shops and restaurants    Will definitely go back again
data.title: Wedding anniversary trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr PaulBungay,

We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your Doubletree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach experience. We are very happy to hear that you had a great time during your stay and that you found the level of service and hotel amenities to be satisfactory. It's amazing to hear that we contributed to the memories of your 50th wedding anniversary. Since our staff takes great pleasure in offering a true feeling of hospitality, it is good to hear that your interactions with our team were positive and that our colleagues looked after you properly to ensure that you had an amazing time. look forward to welcoming you back to Doubletree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach in the near future!

Best Regards, 
Roufan Riaz 
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Roufan Riaz

data.text:
Great hotel with private beach right at Jumeirah Beach. We had a great room at the 20th floor with panorama view. We travelled as a family. 
Good breakfast and large pool area, heated pool. Good service, nice and clean rooms. Highly recommended hotel.
data.title: Great hotel with private beach right at Jumeirah Beach.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rasmusjaegersoe.

It was an absolute pleasure reading your review on Tripadvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for considering us your “home away from home”.  It is our commitment to ensure our guests feel welcomed and are taken care of by our colleagues so that they have unforgettable experiences.  We are grateful for your high recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back to DoubleTree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach in the near future!

Kind Regards,
Vanessa Kadissi
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Vanessa Kadissi
